text: Mark off the width and height of Hello Kitty. Draw the shape of her head. Add a line through the center of the figure.
Draw the nose and ears of Hallo Kitty. Add a line to define the place for her pelvis.
Draw the body and feet of the girl. Add a circle for the flower on her head.
Add the arms, flower petals and collar of the T-shirt.
Sketch the sleeves of the T-shirt, thumbs, eyes and whiskers of Hello Kitty. Add a circle to the flower.
Contour Hello Kitty, trying to vary the thickness and darkness of the line. Add the ground. Erase all guidelines.
